metadata.title: CVE-2023-29824 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** A use-after-free issue was discovered in Py_FindObjects()function in SciPy versions prior to 1.8.0. NOTE: the vendor and discovererindicate that this is not a security issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29824` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-scipy - 1.8.0-1exp2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: scipy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-1exp2ubuntu1').
